oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-09-10 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 10, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Justin Tubb; Chet Atkins; George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: George Morgan introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Justin Tubb -- Within Your Arms (Justin Tubb) -- George Morgan introduces Chet Atkins -- Side By Side (Chet Atkins) -- George Morgan talks -- Little Pioneer (George Morgan) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Tubb, Justin
